attributes.action: let the area known as brabyns park in marple, be declared an independant state from that of the brittish isles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this will allow the brabyns park which is situated between marple and marple bridge an independant country

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
